options.content:
# Disclaimer

⚠️ This dashboard has some sample thresholds, this example is not meant to fit all use cases nor is it meant for production. Think of it as a learning tool to help you become comfortable with the metrics and thresholding.

panels.description: The average per-second number of retried record sends for a topic. An increase could signal connectivity problems from the application to the broker.
panels.title: Retry rate

panels.description: The average per-second number of record sends that resulted in errors.
panels.title: Record error rate

panels.description: he total amount of buffer memory that is not being used (either unallocated or in the free list).
panels.title: Free buffer space

panels.description: The average time in ms a request was throttled by a broker.
panels.title: Produce request throttle average

panels.description: The average compression rate of record batches for a topic, defined as the average ratio of the compressed batch size over the uncompressed size.
panels.title: Compression rate

panels.description: The average request latency in ms.
panels.title: Produce request latency

panels.description: The average time in ms record batches spent in the send buffer.
panels.title: Record queue time

panels.description: Fraction of time an appender waits for space allocation
panels.title: Bufferpool wait ratio

panels.description: The rate of failed authentication per seconds
panels.title: Failed authentication rate

panels.description: The average number of bytes sent per second to the broker.
panels.title: Outgoing byte rate

panels.description: The average number of bytes sent per second to the broker per topic.
panels.title: Outgoing byte rate per topic

panels.description: The average number of messages sent per second to the broker.
panels.title: Outgoing messages per second

panels.description: The average number of messages sent per second to the broker per topic.
panels.title: Outgoing messages per second per topic

panels.description: The average number of bytes sent per partition per-request.
panels.title: Batch size average

panels.description: The current number of in-flight requests awaiting a response.
panels.title: Request in flight

panels.description: The average record size
panels.title: Record size average

panels.description: The average number of requests sent per second to the broker.
panels.title: Produce request rate

panels.description: The average number of records per request.
panels.title: Produce request size average

panels.description: The average number of response received per second to the broker.
panels.title: Produce response rate

panels.description: The current number of active connections.
panels.title: Connection rate

panels.description: New connections established per second in the window.
panels.title: Connection creation rate

panels.description: Connections closed per second in the window.
panels.title: Connection close rate

panels.description: The fraction of time the I/O thread spent doing I/O.
panels.title: IO Ratio

panels.description: The average length of time the I/O thread spent waiting for a socket ready for reads or writes in nanoseconds.
panels.title: IO Wait time average

panels.description: The average length of time for I/O per select call in nanoseconds.
panels.title: IO Time average

panels.description: The fraction of time the I/O thread spent waiting.
panels.title: IO Wait Ratio

panels.description: Number of times the I/O layer checked for new I/O to perform per second.
panels.title: Select Rate

panels.description: The age in seconds of the current producer metadata being used.
panels.title: Metadata max age
